SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="4e173773d2cb4ced8d20ee8f7688eee1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Hiya![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Oh, uh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]are you from this planet?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
No?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK, yeah.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4e173773d2cb4ced8d20ee8f7688eee1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]So then does that mean...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You must be in
the Rescue Corps![etc:Wait frame="8"/] That is SO awesome![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4e173773d2cb4ced8d20ee8f7688eee1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I came here with my high school's
Planetary Science Club,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but things have
not gone according to plan.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4e173773d2cb4ced8d20ee8f7688eee1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Our ship malfunctioned,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and yeah, we were
able to escape,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it was a big flustery
mess,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and that's not even the half of it!
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="673f474da4234c0ebb9f226668ef2b53" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]I'm glad to hear my fellow Planetary
Science Club members, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],
and even [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Meeki[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], are doing OK.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="673f474da4234c0ebb9f226668ef2b53" Scale="1"/]Last time I saw 'em,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was angry and
screaming into the void, and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was
just quietly smiling...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="673f474da4234c0ebb9f226668ef2b53" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Meeki[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] let us escape first, and we had to
leave her behind...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It must've been awful.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="1457489038814ae9abb8cdd4a89dc5bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]When we were ejected from the ship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we
got hit by some turbulence,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and I was
separated from [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1457489038814ae9abb8cdd4a89dc5bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I panicked a little...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]but then I saw all the
beautiful things on this planet![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1457489038814ae9abb8cdd4a89dc5bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I was just walking around all excited
and looking at everything.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I guess I got
exhausted and passed out.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Until now.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="a82cbcb63d8742adaa7b230a25c00921" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I focus a lot on meteorology in the
Planetary Science Club,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but the more
complicated stuff goes way over my head.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a82cbcb63d8742adaa7b230a25c00921" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Really, I just like to look around and notice
things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] like the shifts that happen in a
sunny sky as a storm cloud moves in...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a82cbcb63d8742adaa7b230a25c00921" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Or that wavy, shimmering haze of heat
you can see when the weather gets hot.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="3358eed09314432488be3cb6476bf889" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Whenever [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I don't know what to
do next,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] always leads the way.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
She points and we follow.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="4c4895733390465bb1e76e4341fff3b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is a planner.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She always follows
through.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Me?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm the total opposite.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="37afcf1a858b4779bdbcba51f914975e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I bet Mom and Dad are pretty worried
about me...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm missing way more school
than they thought I would.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="37afcf1a858b4779bdbcba51f914975e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Probably best not to think about that too
much for now.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="95c3f1ad176c4f1bb540a99875343653" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Meeki[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is the supervisor of our club.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We
asked her to come with us so it could be,
like,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] an "official" club activity.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="95c3f1ad176c4f1bb540a99875343653" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] won this trip for the students as
part of a raffle,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Meeki[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s the only one
who paid out of pocket to come.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="c5da1dbc56a8435490512c725dea7a3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm supposed to take notes on the weather
and cloud coverage every day at a certain
time for the Planetary Science Club.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c5da1dbc56a8435490512c725dea7a3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]When [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] finds out that I didn't do it
on a particular day,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] she always says, "Ugh.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Unbelievable."[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then she rips into me.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="c1945d3a6bf74c478b7d1009d0bf8a1d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I've noticed that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] always has this
little smile on her face when she looks at
the stars!
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="01563fbc2a484959b29cb5a9f8553c8e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] knows, like,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] everything about rocks
and minerals.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She's always telling me all
about them with such passion![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="01563fbc2a484959b29cb5a9f8553c8e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]The best part is she doesn't get mad at
me whenever I start to nod off while
listening to her spiels.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="5bc3b7e3b631485ab4027848187e8194" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]On the first day of school,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was standing
in the courtyard, just looking at the sky.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Someone came up to me and said...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5bc3b7e3b631485ab4027848187e8194" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]"Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Cloud gazer![etc:Wait frame="15"/] If you like the sky
so much,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you should join the science club."[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Then she stared at me really hard.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5bc3b7e3b631485ab4027848187e8194" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I've never known how to say no to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
But that's how I ended up joining the club,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
even though it technically didn't exist yet.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="aff9c72e0dac41838382296d58b86dbb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] gets annoyed with me for calling
our supervisor "[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Meeki[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]."[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She says it's
disrespectful,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and she's probably right.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="aff9c72e0dac41838382296d58b86dbb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]But "Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]" is so formal, you know?[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
It's just not my style.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="b41331c4257b442ebd04e529cea87a66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Perseverance really isn't my strong suit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I don't know if I just have a short
attention span or if I get bored easily.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b41331c4257b442ebd04e529cea87a66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSadNoVoice"/]Either way,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I know it's a problem.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I guess
I should try to work on that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Really stick
with it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know?
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="928b962b276e4d7eaf203a00735942e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I focus a lot on meteorology in the
Planetary Science Club,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but the more
complicated stuff goes way over my head.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="928b962b276e4d7eaf203a00735942e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Really, I just like to look around and notice
things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] like the shifts that happen in a
sunny sky as a storm cloud moves in...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="928b962b276e4d7eaf203a00735942e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Or that wavy, shimmering haze of heat
you can see when the weather gets hot.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="4be642f982cc461899719a7d16d76993" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Whenever [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I don't know what to
do next,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] always leads the way.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
She points and we follow.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="2e0fbe1f896e414e91b998acb1b3fb65" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is a planner.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She always follows
through.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Me?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm the total opposite.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="9bedc25f64fa47ca92c926a76fcf9523" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I bet Mom and Dad are pretty worried
about me...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm missing way more school
than they thought I would.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9bedc25f64fa47ca92c926a76fcf9523" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Probably best not to think about that too
much for now.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="e7b23b102f924ec49b2d1b9f7189e738" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Meeki[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is the supervisor of our club.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We
asked her to come with us so it could be,
like,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] an "official" club activity.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e7b23b102f924ec49b2d1b9f7189e738" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] won this trip for the students as
part of a raffle,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Meeki[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s the only one
who paid out of pocket to come.
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="0028d56122e044c88511e51bfbec8478" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Bowwow![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Woof, woof!
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="b0b987a319b643e6884006cea6c3a9af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Do you like to talk, my little puppy pup?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Me?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I just love to talk!
SV015.SV015_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal19"/][UE:Meta key="793a1b5a50da45559b3121a638512f3d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Um...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Are you...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]me?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="793a1b5a50da45559b3121a638512f3d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]You must be me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That means there may
be a whole lot more of me in this universe.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
There's no other explanation!
